title: CONTENT MARKETPLACE SUPPORTED BY AI
description: Brand owners hate for feedbacking the content, but even with a professional content writer, they usually need feedback at least 2 times

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal is for the development of an AI that will generate content, the proposal does not present a usecase for a NFT business model and thus the proposal does not meet the challenge. I would like the team to elaborate how the project will deliver value to the Cardano ecosystem, at the moment the proposal appears to be unconnected with the Cardano ecosystem.
f6_assessments.q1: I like the idea but the proposal requires further development to ensure successful implementation. I would want to see links to LinkedIn or similar to provide additional detail/evidence about the team work history, education and past experiences. The team can expand on the type and number of team members required to implement the proposal and creation of the AI. I advise the team to develop a risk assessment considering the challenges and risks relevant to a successful implementation, the team needs to think: "what needs to be true for this project to succeed". I would like the team to expand on the plan to go to market and acquire customers. I would like the team to provide a deeper explanation about the architecture and language for the implementation of the back end of the product and how this will connect to the Cardano blockchain.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal has a high level roadmap and one KPI.  I would like to see the team further develop and define Key Performance Indicators (KPI's) for the project, then connect the KPIs to the milestones on the project roadmap. The budget is mainly allocated for payment of labor (salaries) in the format of $ charged per hour multiplied by time period. – I would like the team to connect the KPI's and roadmap milestones to the labor spending, what are the specific tasks and deliverables that the labor must provide and when must they deliver – this breakdown will give a clearer indication about the implementation workload feasibility and match the deliverables to the labor spending. As the project stands at the moment, I feel the project will be difficult to audit.

f6_assessments.q0: Problem statement being providing good feedback for the content by using AI not only to provide good feedback and make content sales driven but also makes brand owner okay with it hence this will effectively addresses the challenge
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer has a good past experience on content creation related things which will be very helpful for the project. They have provided detailed steps they are gonna take and also has very good team therefore it very likely that proposal will be implemented successfully.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposer has provided detailed timeline and also fund breakdown which should be enough to track the progress of the proposal and also sufficient to audit the success of the proposal

solution: AI will helps content creator to optimize the content by rewarding and recommending the best and most effective sales driven content.
experience: Founder has +10 years working on content industry, also sold 20+ types of content development service packages in 2 years for this project.
